pyktx.ktx_supercmp_scheme module

class pyktx.ktx_supercmp_scheme.KtxSupercmpScheme(value)[source]

Bases: IntEnum

Enumerators identifying the supercompression scheme.

BASIS_LZ = 1

Basis LZ supercompression.

NONE = 0

No supercompression.

ZLIB = 3

ZLIB supercompression.

ZSTD = 2

ZStd supercompression.
